title: purpose of giving further effect to Council Regulation (EU) No 1224/2009 of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Community
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Community 

Control System) (Amendment) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited sea-fisheries (community control system) (amendment) regulation 2022

title: purpose of giving further effect to Council Regulation (EU) No 1224/2009 of
heading: 2. The Sea-Fisheries (Community Control System) Regulations 2016 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. The Sea-Fisheries (Community Control System) Regulations 2016 (S.I. 

No. 54 of 2016) are amended— 

(a) 

In Regulation 2(1), by inserting after “28 October 2015” in the 
definition of “Commission Regulation” the following: “and 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/30 of 14 
January 2020”, 

(b) 

In Regulation 4(1)(b), by inserting “81,” after “80(1) and (2),”, 

(c) 

(d) 

In Regulation 4(4)(a), by substituting “Council Regulation” for 
“Control Regulation”, and 

In Regulation 7, by substituting “Council Regulation” for 
“Control Regulation” in each place it occurs. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 September, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1OJ L 343, 22.12.2009, p.1 
2 OJ L 112, 30.4.2011, p1 
3 OJ L 9, 15.1.2020, p.3 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [463] 3
text_norm: 2 sea-fisheries (community control system) regulation 2016 (s.i no 54 2016) amended-- (a) regulation 2(1) inserting 28 october 2015 definition commission regulation following commission implementing regulation (eu) 2020 30 14 january 2020 (b) regulation 4(1)(b) inserting 81 80(1) (2) (c) (d) regulation 4(4)(a) substituting council regulation control regulation regulation 7 substituting council regulation control regulation place occurs given official seal 7 september 2022 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine 1oj l 343 22.12.2009 p.1 2 oj l 112 30.4.2011 p1 3 oj l 9 15.1.2020 p.3 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 23rd september 2022 463 3

title: purpose of giving further effect to Council Regulation (EU) No 1224/2009 of
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Sea-Fisheries (Community Control System) 
Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 54 of 2016) in certain respects. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [463]
